name: 符号化方法
complexity: Varies by construction (e.g., O(n log n) for generating functions)
scenarios: Combinatorial enumeration, generating function manipulation, counting problems (e.g., partitions, trees, subsets)
extensions: Unlabeled/labeled systems, restricted constructions (SEQ_k, MSET_k, PSET_k, CYC_k), applications to integer partitions, tree counting, and combinatorial designs
